title: From Stadiums To Shelters: Remembering Pritzker Winner Frei Otto
teaser: German architect Frei Otto has been named the 2015 winner of the Pritzker Architecture Prize. The announcement was moved up from March 23, because Otto died on Monday at the age of 89.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
